# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = []
    for word in split(text)
        if length(word) + length(lines) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        push!(lines, word)
    end
    return join(lines)
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello world this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped to fit within 10 characters per line.")
"Hello\nworld\nthis\nis\na\nvery\nlong\nsentence\nthat\nshould\nbe\nwrapped\nto\nfit\nwithin\n10\ncharacters\nper\nline."
```
